content.body: Michael Ficarra: bakkot: i wanna do a temperature check among us for moving structured clone into tc39 and owning it (+ the structured clone algorithms for 262 objects)
content.formatted_body: Michael Ficarra: bakkot: i wanna do a temperature check among us for moving structured clone into tc39 and owning it (+ the structured clone algorithms for 262 objects)

content.body: I would be happy with that if HTML is on board
indeed, domenic is the one who reached out to me to do it
i'm thinking of an initial proposal to not expose it programmatically, just to do the refactoring across specs
we'll then split the maintenance responsibilities as 262 owning the cloning algorithms for 262+402 objects, and HTML owns the others, instead of HTML owning everything
the possibly contentious normative thing to hash out is what to throw for errors
